attributes.action: insurance companys should have to pay back at least 70% of premiums if the policy holder has no claim
attributes.additional_details: insurance company should have to pay back at least 70% of policy if policy holder has no claim over the period of the policy. they take money on a what if they then invest our money in stock&shares and make money from it they they put our premiums up the following year and the government watches idly by n watches more and more people struggle

rejection.details: This is a matter for the insurance industry.  If you are petitioning for the Government to regulate the insurance industry in this way, this should be made clear.
